data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Udinese.
Michael Fabbri awards the home team a throw-in.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Udinese's Ken Sema is whistled for offside at Dacia Arena.
Fiorentina drive upfield and Pol Lirola gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Udinese defender.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Udinese have a goal kick.
Ilija Nestorovski for the home team is judged to be offside.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese at Dacia Arena.
Michael Fabbri signals a Udinese throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Rolando Mandragora of Udinese gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Fiorentina.
Fiorentina are in shooting range from this free kick.
Udinese's Ilija Nestorovski has been booked in Udine.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Udinese's Rolando Mandragora breaks free at Dacia Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Goal kick for Udinese at Dacia Arena.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Udinese's William Troost-Ekong misses with an attempt on goal.
Michael Fabbri awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Udinese's Stefano Okaka attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Michael Fabbri signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Fiorentina's area.
Stefano Okaka (Udinese) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Michael Fabbri awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Udinese.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In Udine Fiorentina drive forward through Alfred Duncan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Fiorentina are on the attack at Dacia Arena, where Nikola Milenkovic is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Important block from the Udinese defence as Gaetano Castrovilli fires in a strike for Fiorentina.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Federico Chiesa for Fiorentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Udinese at Dacia Arena.
Udinese drive forward but Ken Sema is judged offside.
Michael Fabbri waits before resuming play because Alfred Duncan for Fiorentina is still down.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Udine.
Fiorentina needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
Alfred Duncan for Fiorentina is back on the field again.
The first-half has ended.
Michael Fabbri has blown to start the second-half.
In Udine, Rodrigo De Paul of Udinese is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Ken Sema gets his shot on target but fails to score for Udinese.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Udine.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rolando Mandragora (Udinese) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
Udinese's Rodrigo De Paul gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Michael Fabbri awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Dusan Vlahovic for Fiorentina drives towards goal at Dacia Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Udine.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Udinese are coming forward and Rodrigo De Paul gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Kevin Lasagna is on a sub for Ilija Nestorovski for Udinese.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Michael Fabbri signals a Udinese throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Michael Fabbri signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Udinese's area.
Michael Fabbri blows against Udinese's Kevin Lasagna for offside.
Seko Fofana is replacing Mato Jajalo for Udinese at Dacia Arena.
The away team have replaced Igor with Patrick Cutrone. This is the first substitution made today by Giuseppe Iachini.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Udinese at Dacia Arena.
Kevin Lasagna of Udinese smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
Ken Sema for Udinese has been booked by Michael Fabbri and receives a first yellow card.
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Michael Fabbri signals a Udinese throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Can Udinese capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Marvin Zeegelaar is replacing Ken Sema for the home team.
Rodrigo Becao (Udinese) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rolando Mandragora (Udinese) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Dacia Arena.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Free kick Fiorentina.
Giuseppe Iachini (Fiorentina) is making a second substitution, with Erick Pulgar replacing Milan Badelj.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Fiorentina are pushing forward but Alfred Duncan's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Udinese's Seko Fofana misses with an attempt on goal.
Michael Fabbri awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Michael Fabbri will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fiorentina's Federico Chiesa gets in a shot on goal at Dacia Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
